name: Formal Greeting
description:
Greeting formally
Please retyping what you had been Listening to
text: Good morning Professor Austin how are you doing
Good morning James I am doing well And you
I’m great thank you This is my friend Emma

name: Formal Introduce
text: Wilson I’d like you to meet Dr. Edward Smith
nice to meet you Dr. Smith Pleasure to meet you too
Smith is an economist He just finished writing a book on international trade
That’s my field too I work for the United Nations
In the Development Program by any chance

name: informal Greetting
text: Hi Helen How’s it going Fine thanks and you
Just fine Where are you off to
To the library I’ve got a history exam next week and need to start studying
Oh no Well I’ll see you later then Good luck Thanks See you later

name: Informal Introduction
text: Who’s the tall woman next to Barbara
That’s her friend Mary Didn’t you meet her at Steve’s party
No I wasn’t at Steve’s party
Oh Then let me introduce you to her now Mary this is  my friend Jim
Hi Jim Nice to meet you
You, too Would you like a drink Sure let’s go get one

name: coincidence
text: Well hello there Julia Long time no see
Meg Hi What a coincidence I haven’t seen you in ages What are you doing here
I just got a new job in the city so I’m shopping for some clothes Hey what do you think of this shirt
well you know how much I love blue See I’ve got the same shirt
You always did have good taste What a small world

name: Can You Say That Again
description: How to say someone to say again something
text: Hi Luke How are you Can you please stop and pick up extra paper for the computer printer
What did you say Can you repeat that please
Did you say to pick up ink for the printer Sorry the phone is cutting out
Can you hear me now No I need more computer paper Listen I’ll text you exactly what I need
Thanks Stephanie Sorry my phone has really bad  reception here

name: Telephone
text: Hi Alice it’s John How are you Oh hi John I was just thinking about you
That’s nice I was wondering if you’d like to go to a movie tonight

I was thinking about that new comedy Lights Out What do 
you think
OK I’ll pick you up around 7:30 The movie starts at 8:00 See you then Bye

name: What time is it
description: What time is it and so on
text: What time is it We’re going to be late
It’s a quarter after seven We’re on time Don’t panic
But I thought we had to be at the restaurant by 7:30 for the surprise party
We’ll never make it there with all this evening traffic
Sure we will Rush hour is almost over Anyway the party starts at 8:00
But I do need help with directions Can you call the restaurant and ask them where we park our car
